Package com.ibm.streams.management.job

Interface OperatorConnectionMXBean

public interface OperatorConnectionMXBean
OperatorConnectionMXBean provides attributes and operations for managing an operator connection of a Streams job.

Note: The job must be registered before accessing any of these attributes or operations. See InstanceMXBean.registerJob(BigInteger) for more information.

ObjectNameBuilder.operatorConnection(String, String, String) can be used to build the ObjectName for a OperatorConnectionMXBean.

The JobMXBean snapshot and PeMXBean snapshot operations provide an option to include attributes of descendant objects in the generated snapshot. If the value of the maximumDepth parameter identifies operator connection attributes should be included in the snapshot, the JSON format of the operator connection information returned is described in the product documentation. See topic: REST management API reference > Get operator connection. The following differences exist for the JMX output:

  • The REST specific properties: resourceType, restid, and self are not included.
  • The values of the job, pe, operator, and outputPort properties of the embedded source object are the unique identifiers for each.
  • The values of the job, pe, operator, and inputPort properties of the embedded target object are the unique identifiers for each.

  • Field Details

    • IBM_Teracloud_ApS_COPYRIGHT

      static final String IBM_Teracloud_ApS_COPYRIGHT
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TYPE

      static final String TYPE
      TYPE is used to identify this bean as an operator connection bean when building the bean's ObjectName. The value is "domain.instance.job.operator.connection"
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • getId

      String getId()
      Returns the unique identifier for the connection within the instance.
      Returns:
      the instance identifier.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getPeConnection

      String getPeConnection()
      Returns the processing element (PE) connection identifier corresponding to this operation connection. If this operator connection is between two operators with the same PE, null is returned.

      Note: This attribute is not included in the snapshot on a JobMXBean.snapshot(int, boolean) or a JobMXBean.snapshot(int, boolean) call if includeStaticAttributes is false.

      Returns:
      the corresponding PE connection identifier, if any.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • isRequired

      boolean isRequired()
      Indicates whether the connection is required to be connected before messages are processed for the operator.

      Note: This attribute is not included in the snapshot on a JobMXBean.snapshot(int, boolean) or a JobMXBean.snapshot(int, boolean) call if includeStaticAttributes is false.

      Returns:
      the required indicator for the connection.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getSourceJob

      BigInteger getSourceJob()
      Returns the identifier of the job which is the source of the connection.

      Note: This attribute is not included in the snapshot on a JobMXBean.snapshot(int, boolean) or a JobMXBean.snapshot(int, boolean) call if includeStaticAttributes is false.

      Returns:
      the source job identifier.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getSourceOperator

      String getSourceOperator()

      Note: This attribute is not included in the snapshot on a JobMXBean.snapshot(int, boolean) or a JobMXBean.snapshot(int, boolean) call if includeStaticAttributes is false.

      Returns:
      the source operator name.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.

    • getSourceOutputPort

      int getSourceOutputPort()
      Returns the index within the containing operator of the source output port of the connection.

      Note: This attribute is not included in the snapshot on a JobMXBean.snapshot(int, boolean) or a JobMXBean.snapshot(int, boolean) call if includeStaticAttributes is false.

      Returns:
      the source output port index.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.
